value: These Securities portfolio data of the Customer are generated based on the data from BCA’s system and may not reflect the latest portfolio condition.

If there is any discrepancy between the portfolio data presented on this page and the Proof of Ownership issued by the Custodian Bank, the Proof of Ownership issued by the Custodian Bank shall prevail.
The confirmation of investment in Bonds issued by the Custodian Bank constitutes a valid proof of ownership.
The implementation of Early Redemption shall be subject to the provisions set by the Ministry of Finance.
